name: The Game (itch) (EmeraldAlkemist)
description:
Just a normal survival game. There are no talking buttons or fake buttons whatsoever.

Thanks to Brackeys and Sebastian Lague for tutorials and to the Brackeys team for hosting the jam.

UPDATE: I received comments saying that my game won’t load, this isn’t part of it, there is meant to be an actual game, but sadly, due to the rules of the game jam, I won’t be allowed to upload a new build of the game. I’m assuming this is because I didn’t look over the build settings and messed something up. As of now, the game is unplayable.
